content:
Congratulations on your new Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra!

I'd be happy to help you find a great case for your new phone. Here are some top recommendations:

**1. Official Samsung Cases**: Samsung offers a range of cases specifically designed for the S22 Ultra, including the Clear View Case, LED View Case, and Silicone Case. These cases are designed to provide excellent protection and styling.

**2. OtterBox Defender Series**: OtterBox is a well-known brand for rugged phone cases. Their Defender Series offers excellent protection against drops, scratches, and other damage. They have a range of styles and colors to choose from.

**3. Spigen Rugged Armor Case**: Spigen is another popular brand that offers a range of cases for the S22 Ultra. Their Rugged Armor Case provides excellent protection and has a sleek design.

**4. Case-Mate Tough Stand Case**: Case-Mate offers a range of cases, including the Tough Stand Case, which provides excellent protection and has a built-in stand for hands-free viewing.

**5. UAG Monarch Series**: UAG (Urban Armor Gear) offers a range of rugged cases that provide excellent protection and have a sleek design. Their Monarch Series is a great option for the S22 Ultra.

**6. Tech21 Evo Check Case**: Tech21 is a popular brand that offers a range of cases with excellent protection and stylish designs. Their Evo Check Case is a great option for the S22 Ultra.

**7. Ringke Fusion-X Case**: Ringke is a budget-friendly brand that offers a range of cases with excellent protection and stylish designs. Their Fusion-X Case is a great option for the S22 Ultra.

As for your wireless charging pad, that's great to hear that it's working well with your new phone! The S22 Ultra supports wireless charging, so you can continue to use your current pad or consider upgrading to a newer model.

When choosing a case, consider factors such as protection, style, and functionality (e.g., do you need a case with a built-in stand or card slot?). Make sure to check reviews and ratings to ensure the case you choose is compatible with your phone and meets your needs.
